item.title: The Louvre Heist
item.description: Today, we look at how thieves pulled off this weekend’s brazen daylight robbery in Paris and why they did it.

item.title: France Sends Former President Nicolas Sarkozy to Prison to Start 5-Year Sentence
item.description: Nicolas Sarkozy, the president of France from 2007 to 2012, received a five-year sentence after being convicted in a campaign finance scandal.

item.title: Nations Hesitate to Send Troops to Gaza, Fearing Clashes With Hamas
item.description: The Trump peace plan calls for an international security force in the Gaza Strip, but countries that might send troops are wary of danger, an unclear ...

item.title: Judges Warn of ‘Judicial Crisis,’ and Universities Reject Trump Offer
item.description: Plus, a drastic drop in peanut allergies.

item.title: Grace Wales Bonner Is Named Creative Director of Men’s Wear at Hermès
item.description: Grace Wales Bonner is the new creative director of men’s wear at the French fashion house.
